original_text: Through these he has given us his very great and precious promises, so that through them you may participate in the divine nature, having escaped the corruption in the world caused by evil desires.
korean_text: 이로써 그 보배롭고 지극히 큰 약속을 우리에게 주사 이 약속으로 말미암아 너희가 정욕 때문에 세상에서 썩어질 것을 피하여 신성한 성품에 참여하는 자가 되게 하려 하셨느니라

sentences.original_text: Through these he has given us
his very great and precious promises
you may participate in the divine nature
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 신성한 본성에 참여하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: having escaped the corruption in the world
